com.gfycat.common

Class MatrixChain

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gfycat.common.MatrixChain

  • public class MatrixChain
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class that provides short variant of matrix manipulation.

    Created by dekalo on 24.12.15.
